classify.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to decide what group something belongs to
classify.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
In law, beer is classified as a food product.
classify.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to regard people or things as belonging to a particular group because they have similar qualities
classify.translation[0].definitions[1].e: As a musician, Cage is hard to classify.
classify.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to state officially that something belongs to a particular group or type
classify.translation[1].definitions[0].e: a substance that is officially classified as hazardous
